title: thepriceinsats
author: thepriceinsats
content: London Bitcoin Space - Merchant Adoption Roundtable @ Ye Olde Cock TavernWelcome plebs, to the 22nd London Bitcoin Space - bringing together beginner and veteran bitcoiners to learn about Satoshi's gift, connect and lay the foundations of the future!This session will be an opportunity to discuss views around how to approach merchant adoption. Concerns? Strategies? Tips? We are all ears.Pï»¿lease consider bringing your wallet and donating a few sats for a UK food bank (collection on the day)Please no photos/videos without explicit permission of all relevant parties - everyone has the right to privacy.https://www.eventbrite.co.uk/e/london-bitcoin-space-merchant-adoption-roundtable-ye-olde-cock-tavern-tickets-597359697937?aff=ebdssbdestsearch
